dmca.title: Request for Immediate Removal of Site
dmca.body:
NOTICE
[This e-mail and any attachments are subject to Disclaimers listed at
the end.]
________________________________





PLEASE SEE BELOW.





From: [private]
 Sent: Friday, August 24, 2007 2:51 PM
 To: 'abuse at minder.net'
 Subject: Request for Immediate

 Removal of Site



Dear Sir or Madam:



This is a request for the immediate removal of the following site from
your website:  http://www.mail-archive.com/cypherpunks@minder.net/msg70391.html.
  This site has derogatory remarks about our company and owners.  We
have obtained a final judgment and permanent injunction from the
United State District Court in Texas for the removal of this site.
We also have a letter of apology from the author.  All have been
attached for your convenient reference.  Please confirm the immediate
removal of this site to me as soon as possible.  If you have any
questions, please contact me.  Thank you for your prompt attention to
this matter.


[private], CLA

Paralegal

Basic Research

[private]

Salt Lake City, UT 84116

Telephone:  [private]

________________________________

THREE DISCLAIMERS: (1) The contents of this transmission may contain
information that is proprietary, privileged, confidential, or
otherwise is legally exempt from disclosure. This e-mail solely is
intended for the use of the recipient(s) identified above. If you are
not an intended recipient, you may not review, disseminate, distribute
or duplicate this e-mail or any attachment. If you are not an intended
recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and delete this
message. (2)  No employee or agent is authorized to conclude any
binding agreement on behalf of any entity sending or referred-to in
this e-mail without express written confirmation by senior management.
 (3) Although the sender has taken reasonable precautions to ensure no
viruses are present in this e-mail, the sender and any entity
referred-to in this e-mail cannot accept responsibility for any loss
or damage arising from the use of this e-mail or attachments (if any).
